project.name: Calorie & Progress Tracker
project.theme: Light Mode (Organic & Earthy with Vibrant Accents)
project.mood: Encouraging, Fresh, Frictionless, Personal Wellness Coach

scale.h1: text-4xl md:text-5xl font-extrabold tracking-tight leading-tight text-slate-900
scale.caption: text-sm font-medium text-slate-400 uppercase tracking-widest

buttons.primary: bg-gradient-to-r from-[#88C425] to-[#76AD1B] text-white shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl hover:scale-[1.02] transition-all duration-300 font-bold tracking-wide rounded-full px-8 py-3
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-700 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 transition-all font-semibold rounded-full px-6 py-2 shadow-sm
buttons.ghost: text-slate-500 hover:text-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-100 rounded-full px-4 py-2 transition-colors
buttons.floating_action: fixed bottom-24 right-6 w-14 h-14 bg-slate-900 text-white rounded-full shadow-2xl flex items-center justify-center hover:scale-110 active:scale-95 transition-transform z-50 md:hidden

cards.dashboard_stat: bg-white rounded-[2rem] p-6 shadow-[0_8px_30px_rgba(0,0,0,0.04)] border border-slate-100/50 hover:shadow-[0_12px_40px_rgba(0,0,0,0.06)] transition-shadow duration-300
cards.food_item: bg-white rounded-2xl p-4 flex items-center gap-4 border border-transparent hover:border-slate-100 transition-colors cursor-pointer

navigation.bottom_bar: fixed bottom-6 left-4 right-4 h-16 bg-white/90 backdrop-blur-xl border border-slate-200/50 rounded-full shadow-[0_8px_32px_rgba(0,0,0,0.1)] flex items-center justify-around z-40 max-w-md mx-auto

inputs.search: w-full h-12 rounded-2xl bg-slate-50 border-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#88C425]/20 pl-12 text-slate-700 placeholder:text-slate-400 font-medium transition-all

images.description: Three people jogging on a sunny sidewalk, conveying energy and community.
Top-down view of a colorful healthy salad bowl.
Woman holding a glass of water, smiling.
Fresh green smoothie in a clear glass.

critical: DO NOT use generic centered layouts. Use Bento Grids for stats.
Ensure the 'Calorie Ring' on the dashboard is the HERO element (massive size).
Use 'Shadcn/UI' components but override the default 'radius-md' with 'rounded-2xl' or 'rounded-3xl' to match the soft organic theme.
The bottom navigation bar must float above the content, not stick to the very bottom edge.
Use Recharts for the weight progress chart, styling the lines with a smooth curve (monotone) and gradient fill.
dashboard_structure: Top Section: User greeting + Date + Avatar.
Hero Section: Circular Progress Ring (Calories Left) - Center aligned.
Mid Section: Macro Bars (Protein, Carbs, Fat) - Horizontal stack.
Grid Section: Water, Steps, Weight (Bento Grid).

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure text on the primary green background is white. If using light green, use dark text.
accessibility.touch_targets: All interactive elements must be at least 44x44px for mobile fingers.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings on all inputs and buttons for keyboard navigation.
